senses: [{"definition":"An unexpected event with negative consequences occurring without the intention of the one suffering the consequences.","example":"to die by an accident"},{"definition":"Especially, a collision or similar unintended event that causes damage or death.","example":"My insurance went up after the second accident in three months."},{"definition":"Any chance event.","example":null},{"definition":"Chance.","example":null},{"definition":"Any property, fact, or relation that is the result of chance or is nonessential.","example":"Beauty is an accident."},{"definition":"An instance of incontinence.","example":null},{"definition":"An unintended pregnancy.","example":null},{"definition":"A quality or attribute in distinction from the substance, as sweetness, softness.","example":null},{"definition":"(grammar) A property attached to a word, but not essential to it, such as gender, number, or case.","example":null},{"definition":"An irregular surface feature with no apparent cause.","example":null},{"definition":"A sudden discontinuity of ground such as fault of great thickness, bed or lentil of unstable ground.","example":null},{"definition":"A point or mark which may be retained or omitted in a coat of arms.","example":null},{"definition":"Casus; such unforeseen, extraordinary, extraneous interference as is out of the range of ordinary calculation.","example":null},{"definition":"Appearance, manifestation.","example":null}]
